metadata.name: #QR01
metadata.description: This NFT is created for Copernicus Beer. The owner of this NFT is the first member of Copernicus Beer DAO. As a member you have shared ownership of the vault, the brand and the recipe and you can participate in the governance that leads Copernicus Beer to its destiny. All members are equal. You are also able to set the URL associated with one of the twenty-four QR codes, which will be used for promotion of the Copernicus Beer, as on the beer's label. Check copernicusbeer.xyz for more information.
